item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

people who do wish to help others will go past the 3rd page like i myself sometimes even go up to the 10th page. I just check how old the thread is and if its to old ill just leave it and if its recently new then ill help to the best of my ability and if your really desperate you could just bump your own post…

}

}

On all of them. That worked =)

Thanks for the help guys

item.title: Only member can weild this item
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

My friend made my source for me but im having a problem where any item in the game says “Only member can weild this item”, so i had a look in Client.java , and the only things concerning was this

if(deathStage > 0)
return false;
if(wearID == 1645 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 7336 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 6575 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1313 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1313 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1327 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1215 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1217 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1089 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 2568 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sanity”) || !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“J a y”)) {
sM(“Only Member can equip this item.”);
return false;

Im not sure how to remove it if its not that.I removed it all and got 100 errors.

I removed it , but i musnt of put it back right, because now im getting in my run box, when i log into it.

Critical error while checking for data!
phas2:hallothere
Critical error while checking for data!
ags:hallothere

On my previous thread which wont bump to guys said i should completely remove it, but make sure i have enough brackets. So i did but im just getting 100 errors , i must be doing something wrong. This is my code after ive removed it.

		addItem(1436, 1);
		addItem(1436, 1);
		addItem(1436, 1);
		addItem(1436, 1);
	}

}
GOES HERE ( with a })
if(wearID == 5509){
emptySmallPouch();
return false;
}
if(wearID == 5510){
emptyMediumPouch();
return false;
}
if(wearID == 5512){
emptyLargePouch();
return false;
}
if(wearID == 5514){
emptyGiantPouch();
return false;
}
if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM(“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4084 && playerRights != 3)
return false;
if(wearID == 1052 && q7 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Legends Quest to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4035 && q5 == 3){
triggerTele(2650, 4565, 1);
}
if(wearID == 4031 && q5 == 3){
npcId = 1463;
npcId2 = npcId;
isNpc = true;
specGFX(160);
}
if(wearID == 3753 && q8 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Lunar Diplomacy to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4675 && q3 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Desert Treasure to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4587 && q5 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Monkey Madness to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 1305 && q1 != 15 || wearID == 5698 && q1 != 15){
sM(“You must complete Lost City to equip this.”);
return false;
}
if(isInCity()==true && wearID != 1351){
sM(“You can’t equip anything but a bronze axe down here!”);
return false;
}
if(wearID == 714){
return false;
}
if(wearID == 4151 && FightType == 2){
FightType = 3;
SkillID = 3;
}
